TestCase.name: testNestedTopN
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, count_c, w0$o0]) StreamExecRank(orderBy=[count_c DESC], fetch=[10], strategy=[UpdateFastRank[0,1]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecRank(orderBy=[count_c DESC], partitionBy=[a], fetch=[10], strategy=[UpdateFastRank[0,1]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, COUNT(*) AS count_c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, 'cn' AS cn]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecCalc(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testOrderByFetch
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[a ASC, b DESC], fetch=[10], strategy=[AppendFastRank], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testOrderByLimit
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[a ASC, b DESC], fetch=[10], strategy=[AppendFastRank], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopN
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[b DESC], partitionBy=[a], fetch=[10], strategy=[AppendFastRank], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopN2
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[b DESC], partitionBy=[a], fetch=[10], strategy=[AppendFastRank], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNOrderByCountAndOtherField
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[count_c DESC, a ASC], partitionBy=[b], fetch=[10], strategy=[UpdateFastRank[0,1]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, COUNT(*) AS count_c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNWithGroupByTwoAgg
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[sum_c DESC, cnt ASC], partitionBy=[b], fetch=[10], strategy=[ApproxUpdateRank[0,1]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, SUM(c) AS sum_c, COUNT(c) AS cnt]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNAfterAgg
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[sum_c DESC], partitionBy=[b], fetch=[10], strategy=[UnaryUpdateRank[0,1]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, SUM(c) AS sum_c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNForVariableSize
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, $2 AS c, w0$o0 AS rank_num]) StreamExecRank(orderBy=[$2 DESC], partitionBy=[b], rownum=[a], strategy=[UpdateFastRank[0]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[b, a, add(max_c) AS $2]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, MAX(a) AS a, MAX(c) AS max_c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecCalc(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNOrderByCount
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(select=[MAX(a) AS EXPR$0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a]) StreamExecRank(orderBy=[count_c DESC], partitionBy=[b], fetch=[10], strategy=[UpdateFastRank[0,1]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, COUNT(*) AS count_c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecRank(retract=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNOrderBySumWithCond
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[sum_c DESC], partitionBy=[b], fetch=[10], strategy=[UpdateFastRank[0,1]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, SUM(c) AS sum_c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c], where=[>=(c, 0)]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNOrderByUDAG
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[sum_c DESC], partitionBy=[b], fetch=[10], strategy=[UpdateFastRank[0,1]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, increasing_sum(c) AS sum_c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNth
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c, 10 AS rank_num]) StreamExecRank(orderBy=[b DESC], partitionBy=[a], offset=[9], fetch=[1], strategy=[AppendFastRank], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
StreamExecCalc(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[w0$o0 AS rank_num, a, c], where=[IS NOT NULL(b)]) StreamExecRank(orderBy=[b DESC], partitionBy=[a], fetch=[10], strategy=[AppendFastRank], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c], where=[>(c, 1000)]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecCalc(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNWithGroupByConstantKey
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(orderBy=[count_c DESC], partitionBy=[a], fetch=[10], strategy=[UpdateFastRank[0,1]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*, rownum]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, COUNT(*) AS count_c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, 'cn' AS cn]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecCalc(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNWithoutRowNumber2
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[CONCAT(seller_id, venture, stat_date, sku_id) AS rowkey, seller_id, sku_id, venture, stat_date, amt_dtr, byr_cnt_dtr, pv_dtr, uv_dtr]) StreamExecRank(orderBy=[amt_dtr DESC], partitionBy=[seller_id, venture, stat_date], fetch=[10], strategy=[UpdateFastRank[0,1,2,3]], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[seller_id, venture, stat_date]]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[seller_id, sku_id, venture, stat_date], select=[seller_id, sku_id, venture, stat_date, increasing_sum(trd_amt) AS amt_dtr, COUNT(DISTINCT trd_buyer_id) AS byr_cnt_dtr, SUM(log_pv) AS pv_dtr, COUNT(DISTINCT log_visitor_id) AS uv_dtr]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[seller_id, sku_id, venture, stat_date]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]])

StreamExecCalc(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecRank(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(retract=[false], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecExchange(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc]) StreamExecScan(retract=[true], accMode=[Acc])
